amendment.description: Amendment makes technical and clarifying changes to the bill and conforms the bill text to that which was reported by the Committee on Natural Resources.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 113-339 to make technical, clarifying and conforming changes to the Committee Print.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (WA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hastings (WA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Hastings (WA).
